The pilgrim a pleasant piece of gallantry / written in French by M.S. Bremond ; translated into English by P. Belon. Pelerin. English Brémond, Gabriel de. Belon, P. (Peter)
[8], 192 p.
Printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes ..., London : 1680.
Added engraved t.p. Numerous errors in paging. A translation of author's Le pelerin. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
